entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
